title: Sann-Remy Chea - Founder of Kangurus - Video Games
description: Sann-Remy has founded Kangurus in 2021. He has been working in the gaming industry, as a professional, for more than 12 years.
experience: 12 years of experience in top Video Game companies: Activision Blizzard and Ubisoft.
skills: Strong background in Gaming and Web technologies.
location: I work in my garage near Paris, France.
